activities: Inmar, Inc. and its subsidiaries collect consumer information in the course of providing services to consumers and companies related to their participation in customer loyalty programs, coupon processing, rebate processing, and use of software and web-based applications provided by Inmar, Inc. or its affiliates. Inmar uses this information to assist businesses in identifying products and services of interest to consumers, to facilitate effective advertisements of interest to consumers, and to assist consumers in identifying available discounts and offers of interest to them.  Inmar affiliates also use this information to process rebates and coupons, and to provide services to pharmacies to process insurance claims and payment for prescriptions.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: BBB EU Safe Harbor Dispute Resolution Program
recoursemech: BBB EU Safe Harbor Dispute Resolution Program
